item.title: Python tools
item.description: Index pydoc Pip Setuptools json.tool argparse pyinstaller Note on python packages kivy Preferred LSP pydoc To get help with used defined functions and classes, just run pydoc eg: # foo.py def bar(): """this is the docstring for bar()""" print 'hello' def baz(): """this is the docstring for baz()""" print 'world' After Running pydoc: $ pydoc foo # Note do not include the .py extention Help on module foo: NAME foo FILE /path/to/foo.
